topic.title: PT9.1.06 Bulk Progress in Assignments and Progress

body.p: Another feature of Paratext 9.1 is the ability to handle bulk progress.

ul.li: Click the Blue Assignments and Progress button
Click [XMLmind] tab menu and choose Bulk Progress Mode.
All of the stages are approved.

body.p: When you finish doing all your approvals you can go back and uncheck bulk progress mode.
Using the bulk progress mode allows you to quickly approve stages and move those checks to a later stage.
